title: Biksad Rebbe Injured in Crash
body: The Biksad Rebbe, a prominent admor in Williamsburg, was seriously injured after being struck by a vehicle on his way home from davening and learning. He lost consciousness and was rushed to the hospital.

title: Gedolim Mourn Rebbetzin Sorotzkin
body: Gedolim, bnei Torah, and public figures flocked to Telshe-Stone to comfort Rav Shalom Ber Sorotzkin after his mother's passing, Rebbetzin Leah Feiga Sorotzkin a”h, wife of Rav Binyomin Sorotzkin, rosh yeshiva of Yeshivas Ateres Shlomo.

title: Rav Eliyahu Cheshin Passes
body: Rav Eliyahu Cheshin zt”l, a longtime melamed, has passed away at 60. Born in Yerushalayim in 1965, he devoted his life to Torah chinuch and acts of chesed.
